text:
-Within the examination area,
a certain high-rise building on the outskirts of the model city.

The examinees must have evacuated, as there was no one's present.
On the rooftop of that building, a faint blue light flickered.

The light gradually grew larger,
forming a ring, and converged into
the shape of people holding hands.

options.text: I'm getting used to this feeling too...

name: Yotaro
text:
...Is this the warp phenomenon
you were experiencing, [Player]?

name: Yotaro
text:
Indeed, there wasn't much time
from the premonition to the warp, so
it's must have been troublesome when it comes so suddenly.

name: Denebola
text:
That sound earlier,
I've heard it before too.

name: Denebola
text:
It's the same sound that rang out
when my assigned examiner disappeared.
If that's the case-

name: Denebola
text:
Where did that examiner disappear to?
If they just warped,
they should be somewhere...

name: Orbiter
text:
Heh...!
So we can warp
together too!

name: Orbiter
text:
Oh, look, look!
The "Pillar of Light" is nearby too,
isn't that super lucky?

At Orbiter's words,
Pubraseer opened his terminal and
checked their current location.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Ah, it seems this place is
quite on the edge of the examination area.

name: Pubraseer
text:
...However, unfortunately,
there doesn't seem to be a warp spot nearby.

name: Gaisei
text:
Even without a warp spot, it's right before our eyes.
Why don't we just head there directly?

name: Yotaro
text:
Wait, Gaisei-kun.
Isn't that the barrier we were talking about?

Where Yotaro pointed,
a faint, glowing transparent wall
stood adjacent to the building.

It was a colossal barrier, encompassing an entire city,
extending horizontally as far as the eye could see.

On its surface, mysterious geometric patterns
appeared and disappeared.

name: Pubraseer
text:
...Ah, as long as that barrier exists,
it would be difficult to head directly
to the "Pillar of Light."

name: Denebola
text:
...Haa, what bad luck.
Do we have no choice but to move to the nearest
warp spot first...?

name: Orbiter
text:
Oh, no...
Even though it's right in front of us.

name: Gaisei
text:
To detour when the destination is right before one's eyes,
is the height of inconvenience, isn't it?
It's not to this unworthy one's liking.

Saying that, Gaisei
approached the barrier and touched it to confirm.

name: Gaisei
text:
...Hoh, is this a barrier
created by someone's Parallel Weapon?

name: Gaisei
text:
"Observer."
Is it alright to destroy this wall?

name: Yotaro
text:
Hmm, I do think you could.
It probably won't incur repair costs,
and it's many times better than destroying a building.

name: Pubraseer
text:
...Indeed, rather than searching for a warp spot,
crossing this wall would be the fastest method, but...

name: Pubraseer
text:
First of all, I heard it's meant to protect
the city from stray Parallel Weapon blasts.
Would it be so easily destroyed?

options.text: Go for it, Gaisei, smash it!
I think it's quite hard, though...

name: Gaisei
text:
...I see, [Player]-dono,
you wish for me to demonstrate my strength.
Very well- "Observer."

name: Yotaro
text:
I understand.
I'll send you ViewPower.

Yotaro operated his terminal,
and Gaisei held his Parallel Weapon's
blade low.

Then, with blinding speed,
creating a wind around him,
he slashed at the barrier.

name: Gaisei
text:
...Oh, well, well.
Quite a tough one, isn't it?

The trajectory of the piercing slash from Gaisei's Parallel Weapon,
bounced off the barrier the moment of contact.

name: Orbiter
text:
It does seem to have left a slight scratch,
but even Gaisei's attack can't easily break it...!?

name: Denebola
text:
No, it's a barrier designed to counter Parallel Weapons...
It's strange that it even got scratched.

name: Gaisei
text:
...Such strength.
It's a bit boring without a counterattack,
but it's certainly entertaining, isn't it?

name: Gaisei
text:
With this unworthy one's full power,
I could open a hole.
No, I will open one...!

name: Gaisei
text:
Even if it costs me an arm or two,
that too would be enjoyable!

name: Yotaro
text:
Stop, stooop!
No, Gaisei-kun.

name: Yotaro
text:
How much do you think the medical bills would be?
Your earnings alone won't be enough, you know!

options.text: Yotaro-kun, was it about money all along!?

name: Gaisei
text:
...Then, suppose I'll listen to you, "Observer".
How else will you break this wall?

name: Yotaro
text:
That's right...
I don't know who set it up, but as expected,
it's something the License Association prepared.

name: Yotaro
text:
I'll investigate, but
a direct approach won't work, will it?
I need to think of another method...

At Gaisei's words, Yotaro
opened his terminal and started to groan.

name: Yotaro
text:
Speaking of which, [Player].
This wall doesn't have a ceiling section, right?

name: Denebola
text:
...Hm?
Now that you mentioned it, Orbiter.

name: Denebola
text:
Even though there's a barrier, how did you
get inside the examination area?

name: Orbiter
text:
Eh, me?
I just fell from the ceiling...
I didn't do anything special.

name: Pubraseer
text:
That's quite a special method...
However, in that case, it seems the barrier
is only set up to a certain height.

name: Pubraseer
text:
I heard the wall is quite high, so perhaps
the assumption is that there's no need
to cover the ceiling section.

options.text: Because Orbiter did fall from above.

name: Orbiter
text:
Oh, that's right, [Player]!
If we can't break this wall,
we can just climb it!

Orbiter clapped his hands with a joyful smile,
as if he had thought of something good,
and pointed at the wall.

name: Denebola
text:
It's climbing you are talking about, Orbiter.
How tall is this wall...?
It's impossible for anyone, even Gaisei.

name: Gaisei
text:
...Denebola-dono.
With all due respect, you cannot say that.
This unworthy one has also trained his leg techniques-

name: Denebola
text:
...No, I was wrong.
I already knew you'd say something like that.

name: Pubraseer
text:
However, even if we were to jump up,
descending would be too dangerous.
Orbiter, do you have a plan?

name: Orbiter
text:
Yeah, it's okay.
Leave it to me!
It's my specialty!

At Orbiter's confident words,
Pubraseer and [Player]
exchanged glances.

name: Orbiter
text:
Hey, hey, [Player]!
Send me lots of ViewPower!

options.text: I guess you won't know unless you try.

text:
[Player] distributed ViewPower
to Orbiter.

name: Orbiter
text:
Alright-!
Thank you, [Player]!
I'm all set!

name: Orbiter
text:
...Alright, everyone, let's go-!
-"Adventure"! Gravity Well!!

Orbiter's Parallel Weapon
was enveloped in light,
showing its brilliance.

Then, a spherical energy body appeared
above Orbiter's palm.

name: Orbiter
text:
This sphere...!
Eii-!

Orbiter then held his hand up to the sky,
raising the sphere above his head.

name: Gaisei
text:
...Nothing is happening, is it?
In that case, that barrier
cannot be destroyed... hm?

At that moment, the members of the group
began to be "pulled" towards Orbiter.

name: Denebola
text:
The sphere is sucking me in...!?
No, that's not it, this power is...!
Orbiter, could it be that you-

name: Yotaro
text:
This is "gravity", isn't it...!?
M-My body is moving on its own...!
It's like "a bizarre idea"... uh oh!?

name: Orbiter
text:
...S-Sorry!
I got a little carried away,
and made it too strong...!

name: Orbiter
text:
A little weaker... good!
This should be fine now!
Gravity field deployed!

As Orbiter adjusted the output of his Parallel Weapon,
the sphere spread thinly, enveloping
the group's bodies and surroundings.

And, after confirming that each person could move freely,
they actually tried moving-

name: Pubraseer
text:
...T-This is!
Has the direction of gravity changed?

name: Orbiter
text:
Yeah, that's right!
How is it, [Player]!?
Now we can walk up the wall!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Denebola
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I-It's certainly amazing, but...
Orbiter, you won't suddenly lose power
and fall to the ground... right?

options.text: You mean to walk towards the sky!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Denebola
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I-It's certainly amazing, but...
Orbiter, you won't suddenly lose power and fall to the ground... right?

name: Orbiter
text:
I-It's okay!
The gravity generator's output is fixed,
so I promise you won't fall!

name: Orbiter
text:
Ah, but, don't leave the gravity field!
And don't stray far from me!

name: Gaisei
text:
...I see, you hold such power.
This unworthy one seems to have
misjudged your capabilities.

name: Gaisei
text:
Well then, the obstacle has been removed.
Let us proceed, [Player]-dono.

Gaisei casually
started walking up the wall.

name: Yotaro
text:
...Gaisei-kun's ability to grasp the situation,
is certainly worth a perfect score, huh.

name: Yotaro
text:
I-It can't be helped...
I'll brace myself and go.
...H-Hiee...!

name: Denebola
text:
............
"Definitely won't fall", huh.
That's a good omen, I'll make my way too.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Their adaptability is amazing.
I must learn from them.

name: Orbiter
text:
Hey, hey, Captain!
How is it, was I helpful?

name: Pubraseer
text:
Ah, of course.
If we can get out of here with this,
we can solve [Player]'s problem.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Thank you, Orbiter.
You've helped us a lot.

name: Orbiter
text:
Eheheh, yay-!
Astronauts are meant to overcome
unimaginable difficulties, right!?

name: Pubraseer
text:
............
Ah, you're right.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Orbiter, [Player].
Let's hold each other hands and make our way up together.
It's alright, we can put our trust in Orbiter.

name: Orbiter
text:
Let's go, [Player]!
It's okay, we can definitely do it together!

options.text: D-Don't let go, no matter what...!

text:
[Player] grasped the hands
of Pubraseer and Orbiter,
which were offered to them.

Then, they stepped onto the wall,
and took a step towards the sky.

name: Pubraseer
text:
...What a nostalgic feeling.
Combined with the scenery of the ground,
this reminds me of astronaut training.

The boy in the spacesuit gleefully pulled them forward.
From Pubraseer's lips, as he gazed at the boy,
words quietly spilled out.

options.text: Well, you were an astronaut after all!

text:
Nodding to [Player],
Pubraseer searched for words.

name: Pubraseer
text:
...I "was" a spaceship captain.
That past hasn't changed, and
I'm proud of those days.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Together with my comrades who called me Captain,
we pursued our dreams and aimed for the distant cosmos.

name: Pubraseer
text:
They were lively and reliable comrades.
...Though it wasn't uncommon for me to mediate their arguments.

Pubraseer gave a small wry smile.
Various emotions were reflected in his eyes.

name: Pubraseer
text:
...Even so, everyone
cared for each other.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Looking at Orbiter now, the feelings
from that time are flowing back to me.
-No.

Pubraseer gazed at the sky ahead.
Even if it was a hologram projected onto the ceiling,
it appeared endlessly blue to his eyes.

name: Pubraseer
text:
...It was much earlier than that.
Before I became captain, when I was
in the same roles as my comrades...

name: Pubraseer
text:
I, too, like them, was excited, and made a fuss...
-We simply dreamt of exploring the vast cosmos.

-Many years ago.
A space development facility on a certain planet.

There was an astronaut,
diligently training with his comrades.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Hey-!
Aelipe, Damalqi!
Everyone, training's over, right-?

name: Pubraseer
text:
Dinner tonight is fish-!
Why don't we head to the dining hall quickly-?

note:
I'm eyeing the colors from the game myself,
so please forgive me if anything is off.

name: Damalqi
text:
Ah, leader Pub!
You came at just the right time.
Aelipe, that guy, he's at it with Cahoni again...

name: Aelipe
text:
-I've-already-told-you!
Training is necessary!
Why can't you understand!?

name: Cahoni
text:
If it's necessary,
I thought I told you to submit a request!
Why do you always break the rules!?

name: Aelipe
text:
There are exceptions to everything!
If I submitted a request to the Space Force Development Bureau,
it wouldn't make it in time!

name: Cahoni
text:
Then you should have said that from the beginning!
You always have that attitude, so-

name: Timbanos
text:
B-Both of you...
U-Uhm...!
P-Please, stop fighting...?

name: Hirosh
text:
...Hm.
We are done training.
...Timbanos, I'm going back first.

name: Timbanos
text:
...H-Hirosh-san.
W-Wait a minute...!

name: Pubraseer
text:
What, what, you guys?
You're all having fun-!
What are you fighting about this time-?

name: Aelipe & Cahoni
text:
Pub-senpai, Cahoni is-!
Pubraseer, Aelipe is-!

name: Pubraseer
text:
...Pfft, hahaha-!
You two are in perfect sync-!

name: Pubraseer
text:
I'll hear your story later-!
First, let's go to the dining hall to eat-!
You get cranky when you're hungry!

name: Damalqi
text:
That's right, both of you.
Besides, according to leader Pub,
it's fish today, you guys like fish too, right?

name: Cahoni
text:
...W-Well, I don't dislike it,
but Pubraseer is the one who likes fish, right?
And the kind that's hard to identify.

name: Aelipe
text:
Oh, geez, I'm back to my senses now...
...I'm sorry, Cahoni.

name: Cahoni
text:
...Ah, sorry.
Uhm, I shouldn't have said like that too...

name: Damalqi
text:
Hahahahaha!
As expected of leader Pub!
To silence them in one go!

name: Timbanos
text:
Yes... I'm really glad...
Both of you, um...
You're always like that...

name: Hirosh
text:
...Seniors, hurry for food.
Tomorrow is the ceremony.
...Preparation is needed.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Ah, it's good that you're all getting along!
Alright, everyone, let's go eat-!

Laughing, and complaining at each other,
the five comrades followed Pubraseer.

name: Pubraseer
text:
-The six of us
were one team.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Although there was a senior-junior relationship
due to our times of assignment, there was no hierarchy
in our shared desire to become astronauts.

name: Pubraseer
text:
I thought this comfortable time-
my relationship with them,
would last forever.

name: Commander
text:
-Astronauts, gentlemen.
To promote our nation's space development,
the spaceship will be unveiled after this.

name: Commander
text:
Prior to that, we will hold
the appointment ceremony for your leader.

The next day, Pubraseer and his comrades
donned formal attire and
attended the ceremony.

The ceremony hall, accessible only to a select few,
was filled with solemn silence.

The usual lively atmosphere vanished into the solemnity,
leaving Pubraseer and his comrades with serious expressions.

After finishing his greeting, the Commander of the Space Force
took out a piece of paper.
Then, he read it aloud in a clear voice.

name: Commander
text:
...Letter of Appointment.
In our nation's Space Force-

name: Commander
text:
Pubraseer,
I appoint you as the leader
of the Astronaut Investigation Team.

At those unexpected words,
an indescribable surprise and
a sense of "weight" began to constrict his chest.

The Commander nodded to Pubraseer,
took the saber placed on the podium,
and looked at all the members.

name: Commander
text:
As you all know, this saber embodies
our nation's hope to "pioneer the future."

name: Commander
text:
Excellent astronauts, the pride of our nation.
You too, are the hope of our nation.

name: Commander
text:
Challenging the unknown of boundless space will undoubtedly present many difficulties.
I earnestly ask that you all unite as one and support him.

name: Commander
text:
...And, Pubraseer.
We have recognized your strength
to point the way to overcome everything.

name: Commander
text:
Please stand tall and guide them.
-As your leader,
I shall entrust this saber to you.

Having said that, the saber
was offered to Pubraseer.

Searching for words,
Pubraseer took a step forward.
His comrades quietly watched him.

Then, taking a quiet breath,
Pubraseer grasped the saber
offered into his hand.

name: Pubraseer
text:
I don't feel it yet, but...
However, as a leader, I will
fulfill my duty and do my very best.

name: Pubraseer
text:
And, together with my comrades who bear
their devotion to the cosmic and the stars...
I shall pioneer the future of this nation-

name: Pubraseer
text:
I swear to this very saber
that I will take that first step.

As if to discipline himself,
Pubraseer tightly gripped the saber.

At his words, his comrades around him clapped their hands.
In the quiet ceremony hall, five particular sets of applause resonated.

name: Commander
text:
I look forward to good results.
...Surely, you all can achieve it together.

name: Commander
text:
I sincerely hope that your journey into space
will become the guiding light for our nation's development.

name: Commander
text:
-Come now, astronauts.
Let us begin the unveiling ceremony
for the spaceship you will board!

Following those words,
the door behind them flung open.
There, stood-

name: Pubraseer
text: T-this is...!?

Before his eyes, a magnificent spaceship loomed.
Its brand new body shone brightly.

And many spectators
were cheering for the appearing astronauts.

name: Aelipe
text:
...Awesome.
We're going to ride this ship...
We really became astronauts, didn't we?

name: Cahoni
text:
Ah, but, it's "from now on".
We must strive to meet everyone's expectations.

name: Hirosh
text:
...Hm, of course.
That's what we trained for.
It will continue to be so.

name: Timbanos
text:
Y-Yes, that's right...!
Everyone... we have to show them
that we'll do our best...!

name: Damalqi
text:
Ah, that's right.
But it's okay.
We have leader Pub-

name: Damalqi
text:
No, "Captain" Pub is with us.
Right, Captain?

name: Pubraseer
text:
...Ah, ah, that's right!
Everyone, let's go...!

Though a little awkwardly,
Pubraseer took a step into the light-

name: Pubraseer
text:
-I became their leader.
At that time, I probably couldn't
act like one at all.

name: Pubraseer
text:
...I felt anxiety and pressure,
wondering if I could fulfill the role.

name: Pubraseer
text:
...I strongly felt that I couldn't remain as I was.
I had to take on more responsibility and discipline myself...

name: Pubraseer
text:
...Because I had become their leader,
the "captain" of the spaceship.

name: Aelipe
text:
...Damalqi-niisan.
How's Captain doing?

At Aelipe's words,
Damalqi shook his head.

name: Damalqi
text:
...Well, how should I put it,
ever since that ceremony,
he hasn't changed.

name: Damalqi
text:
It's like he's always nervous,
he's become stiff.

name: Timbanos
text:
I-I'm worried for Captain as well...
As expected, the pressure is getting to him... isn't it?

name: Cahoni
text:
That Pubraseer, who seemed so carefree and optimistic,
and always playful, is now like this...

name: Aelipe
text:
Hmm...
Somehow, with Pub-senpai like that,
it throws me off my game...

name: Damalqi
text:
I even tried inviting him
to a big hot spring or something...
but he vaguely declined, saying 'maybe next time.'

name: Hirosh
text:
Hmm...
Do something?
Something to encourage Captain.

His comrades secretly gathered,
racking their brains.

name: Aelipe
text:
...Oh, in that case!
How about this!?

Aelipe clapped his hands,
called everyone together,
and whispered something.

name: Damalqi
text:
...I see.
A surprise, then.

name: Cahoni
text:
Finally a good idea from you, Aelipe.
Doesn't sound too bad, yea?

name: Aelipe
text:
...You always have to add something, Cahoni.
Hey, hey, Hirosh and Timbanos, what do you two think?

name: Hirosh
text:
...Hm.
Agree, very good.

name: Timbanos
text:
I-I too...!
It'll be a bit tough,
but I think I can do it...!

name: Aelipe
text:
Alright, it's decided then!
Listen up, everyone.
We'll keep it a secret from Captain Pub, okay!?

Nodding to each other,
his comrades began to walk together,
ready to start preparing.

name: Pubraseer
text: ...Oh, that's them.

As Pubraseer turned the corner of the hallway,
he saw the backs of his comrades
talking in the distance.

Whispering to each other,
the five of them were heading
somewhere together.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Hey, what are you all
talking about-

A sudden thought consumed his mind.
One thought that had lingered
ever since the appointment ceremony.

-What do they think
of him being chosen as Captain?
They are all experts in their respective fields-

Everyone possessed the qualities and abilities to be a leader.
Do they consider him worthy for this position?

Was he acting appropriately?
Are they satisified with his ways
...of being their Captain?

As he gazed at their retreating backs,
his hand, extended to call out to them,
lost its purpose.

name: Pubraseer
text:
...Why do I feel so awkward?
What should I do...?

name: Pubraseer
text:
What I can do...
As a leader, I have to do
even more for my comrades...

Returning to his room alone,
Pubraseer sighed and gazed at the saber
displayed on his desk.

The colorless, transparent ornamental stone
reflected the light.

name: Pubraseer
text:
...To support everyone's hope
together, huh?

name: Pubraseer
text:
...That's right, even if
my position changes, I'm not alone.
I never have been, and never will be...

Pubraseer stood up,
then grabbed the saber and
left the room.

On his profile, a faint uneasiness
and a firm resolve were reflected.

name: Hirosh
text:
...Captain.
Come here for a moment.

-Then, several weeks later.
One night, Hirosh visited Pubraseer.

name: Pubraseer
text:
...What's wrong, Hirosh?
Today's training should have
ended without problems, though...

name: Pubraseer
text:
...Or perhaps,
did something happen?

At Pubraseer's words,
Hirosh shook his head.

name: Hirosh
text:
...N-no.
Different, a small matter.
Can you, come along?

name: Pubraseer
text:
A-Ah...
I don't mind.

name: Pubraseer
text:
If it's something "I" can do,
just tell me anything.

Hirosh firmly grasped Pubraseer's hand
as he said that.

name: Hirosh
text:
...Captain, it's okay.
Nothing to worry about.
...Let's go.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Hirosh...
I'm sorry, thank you.
...Ah, wait a moment.

Saying that, Pubraseer grabbed his saber
and attached it to his waist.

Then, the place he was
led to by Hirosh's hand-

It was the hill where he and his comrades
always came to watch the stars.

name: Pubraseer
text:
...It's been a long time since I came here.
I haven't been able to come for a while.
But why in such a place-

Just then, suddenly,
the sound of crackers
rang out on the hill.

name: Comrades
text:
-Congratulations, Captain Pubraseer,
on your appointment as leader!!

name: Pubraseer
text:
Oh, oh-!?
You surprised me-...!
What on earth is this...?

name: Hirosh
text:
...Heh.
Captain, surprised.

name: Aelipe
text:
Hahaha-!!
You've got a great expression, Pub-senpai!
As expected, that's how it should be!

name: Cahoni
text:
Since Pubraseer was appointed
as our Captain, we haven't had a proper
celebration, have we?

name: Damalqi
text:
What we can do here is limited, but...
It's our celebration for your appointment!

name: Timbanos
text:
...A-Anyway, we made you an amulet!
Please accept it.

Timbanos carefully took out
a palm-sized device and
offered it to Pubraseer.

name: Pubraseer
text: ...Everyone...

name: Damalqi
text:
That's a compass for space navigation.
We got the technical team to help us,
and somehow managed to make it.

name: Aelipe
text:
We originally had a design concept,
but it was super tough!
We never actually came to a decision, though...

name: Cahoni
text:
How many times did I argue with you, Aelipe?
...Honestly, Captain, how do you always
manage to rein in his recklessness?

name: Aelipe
text:
You say that, but you're always so inflexible, Cahoni!
...Wait, no, it's always been like this.

name: Timbanos
text:
Deciding what to make also...
took quite a bit of, um...
time...

name: Timbanos
text:
But, we still decided to make a compass.
So that "no matter what, our spaceship
can safely reach its destination."

name: Hirosh
text:
...Hm.
Everyone, thinking the same thing.
...Captain will surely be happy.

The five comrades laughed and nodded to each other,
then turned their gaze to Pubraseer.

name: Damalqi
text:
-Captain Pub.
We had quite a hard time
making this.

name: Damalqi
text:
Our opinions were all over the place,
and we each had different strengths and ways of thinking.

name: Damalqi
text:
Each of us could draw dots,
but we couldn't connect them into beautiful lines
like constellations by ourselves.

name: Aelipe
text:
...But, there was one thing
that we all had in common.

name: Aelipe
text:
We wanted to give our dear Captain a present.
To Pub-senpai, who we all love.
...Haha, is that a bit cheesy?

name: Pubraseer
text:
Timbanos, Hirosh, Aelipe,
Damalqi, Cahoni...
Everyone...

Pubraseer gazed at the compass
and the faces of his comrades.

name: Pubraseer
text:
...Thank you, everyone.
I'm truly, truly so happy...!
Ah, it's so beautiful...

name: Pubraseer
text:
This is bad...
No words are coming to my mind.
Even though I'm so, so happy...

Pubraseer buried his face,
and hugged the compass
to his chest with both hands.

name: Aelipe
text:
...Stop it, Captain.
Please don't make that face.
...It's making me tear up too.

name: Damalqi
text:
...Pubraseer.
After the ceremony,
I was a little worried.

name: Damalqi
text:
Ever since then, you've been desperately trying
to fulfill your role as "leader"
as if you were a different person.

name: Damalqi
text:
But don't worry.
It was thanks to you
that we were able to unite like this.

name: Cahoni
text:
We realized that we still need someone
like Captain to give us a push,
to motivate us.

name: Timbanos
text:
W-We...
still love looking at the stars, and space.
That's why we wanted to give it to you here...

name: Hirosh
text:
I want to watch the stars with Captain.
...Like before, again.
I want to laugh together.

As Pubraseer tightly gripped the compass,
his comrades
each placed a hand on his.

name: Pubraseer
text:
...Thank you, everyone.
I-no, "I" was uneasy.

note:
Above was another case of 私 (watashi) and 俺 (boku).
I don't really know how to express it properly, so...

name: Pubraseer
text:
Whether you would accept me as your leader,
whether I could fulfill my duties as your Captain...

name: Pubraseer
text:
...But, it seems all of it was just me worrying unnecessary things.
I was blessed with such excellent and caring comrades.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Those days when we all single-mindedly pursued space,
and ran through it with all our might-
...Your existence was my support.

name: Pubraseer
text:
I will cherish this navigation device.
...It will surely guide us.

Pubraseer carefully placed
the compass into his pocket.

name: Pubraseer
text:
...I also have
a gift for you all.

name: Pubraseer
text:
It's finally complete.
I've been so excited,
looking forward to the day I could show it to you.

Pubraseer took out the saber
he was carrying at his waist.

name: Damalqi
text:
That's the ceremonial saber, right?
Is it okay to bring it?

name: Pubraseer
text:
Ah, I really wanted to bring it onto our spaceship.
I got special permission.

name: Pubraseer
text:
And one more thing...
I made an unreasonable request...
So it took quite a while for it to be accepted.

He drew the blade from its scabbard.
A sparkling white blade and
a decorated handguard were revealed before them.

However, the transparent ornamental stone
had been removed from the handguard.

name: Pubraseer
text:
...Everyone, do you remember
what we talked about here, long ago?

name: Pubraseer
text:
We lay sprawled out, talking about so many dreams, right?
Our favorite stars and scenes we wanted to see someday-

name: Pubraseer
text:
I got permission to specially craft
a handguard inlaid with our "dreams".

As Pubraseer held the saber,
a pleasant night breeze swept through.

Then, he took out
five gems from his pocket.

name: Pubraseer
text:
-A perpetually burning red star.
A scene where water and sky connect,
a deep blue glowing ice cave.

name: Pubraseer
text:
A vivid golden dawn,
a world of endless grasslands...

Pubraseer gazed at each person's face
and traced the gems with his fingertips.

name: Pubraseer
text:
...These gems, I wanted them to be
the embodiment of your hopes.
Everyone, will you inlay them for me?

name: Aelipe
text:
...Hahaha!
That's super cool!
That's great, Captain!

name: Aelipe
text:
I love that kind of thing!
Heheh, though it's a bit cheesier than me!

name: Pubraseer
text:
...Ugh, don't tease me so much.
I was thinking the same as everyone else.
I wanted to surprise you all...!

name: Hirosh
text:
...Hm.
Very beautiful.
Captain, you remembered.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Ah, of course.
It's our "dream" after all.

At Pubraseer's words,
his comrades laughed and nodded to each other,
then each took a gem from his hand.

Then, one by one, they inlaid them
into the saber's handguard.

name: Aelipe
text:
...Pub-senpai, no, Captain.
I really feel like I made the right choice
being your subordinate.

name: Damalqi
text:
Ah, me too.
Don't worry alone from now on.
We will always be by your side to support you.

name: Timbanos
text:
This saber... it's like that, isn't it?
We... are always together.

name: Cahoni
text:
Even so...
You really remembered my favorite star.
...Someday, let's see it together, Captain.

name: Hirosh
text:
...Hm.
Let's go see all those sceneries.
We can surely do it.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Ah...
Just like this saber,
we are all one, together.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Together, let's succeed in space flight,
and conduct fruitful research.
...And, surely-

The saber, now holding five gems,
reflected the colors of dreams,
sparkling with the light of the stars.

Pubraseer quietly
returned the saber to its scabbard.

name: Pubraseer
text:
...Surely, we will return
to this star again.
-Pioneering our future.

No one had anything more to say.
They simply, quietly nodded at their leader's words,
responding with their eyes.

Under the starry sky, Pubraseer and
his comrades layered their hands on each other,
as if making a vow.

A falling star
drew a single silver thread.
They all watched it.

name: Pubraseer
text:
-A nostalgic memory.
But, never has it fade away from my memories.

name: Pubraseer
text:
...The day I truly became
the leader of my comrades-
my friends.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Not knowing what would happen next,
or what kind of journey awaited us,
...back then, I just chased my dreams.

name: Pubraseer
text:
...But, we never got to
fulfill that promise.

name: Pubraseer
text:
The saber that held the nation's hope,
the important compass given by everyone.
...Even my precious friends.

name: Pubraseer
text:
...I could not fulfill
anything entrusted to me.

name: Pubraseer
text:
...Even without realizing it, such a long time has passed
since then.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Those I should apologize to,
those with whom I could share my regrets,
no one remains in this time.

Pubraseer gripped the pendant
at his chest.

From it, the voices of his comrades,
unchanged from that time, could be heard.

『-Captain Pubraseer.
You are the irreplaceable "pride"
of all of us crew members.』

『So... please.
Please-』
『Live, and, remember us.』

name: Pubraseer
text:
-This time, will I be able to keep the
feelings entrusted to me without losing them?

name: Pubraseer
text:
What can I do now?
Along with the memories of my friends,
what do I wish to achieve?

name: Pubraseer
text:
...I must find
a way to use this life
I was granted.

Chapter 5:
What Was Entrusted to the Meteor

-Archimedes Colony,
Central District.
Main Street.

name: Yoshiori
text:
...Damn it!
It's supposed to be my day off,
and you guys are getting in the way!

name: Yoshiori
text:
You must have been ready, right!?
-"Recover"! Operation Regain!!

Yoshiori's bullet pierced the center of the monster
that was moving at an incredible speed.

name: Yoshiori
text:
...Tch, no reaction, huh.
Are these the split bodies President was talking about?
They just keep coming, there's no end to it!

name: Exio
text:
Something seems to be happening
at the "Pillar of Light"...
-Melide, behind you.

name: Melide
text:
Yes, understood...!
Monomasa, take this power!

name: Monomasa
text:
-Leave it to me. "Betrayal", Téras Prodosía!
Oooooh...!!

name: Engine-type Larvae
text: -Ooon...!

name: Monomasa
text:
There are still many of them, so be careful.
You two, fall back.

name: Melide
text:
Yes, it seems there are still monsters around.
Monomasa, Yoshiori-niichan, be careful...!

name: Yoshiori
text:
...Hah, don't underestimate me.
This isn't even worth a warm-up,
but I guess I'll play around a bit.

name: Monomasa
text:
...Yoshiori, let's go.
Melide, Exio.
I'm counting on your support.

name: Exio
text:
...Got it.
It seems the enemy's presence is increasing.
Don't let your guard down.

At Exio's words,
Yoshiori and Monomasa nodded and
raced through the city that had become a battlefield.

name: Exio
text:
...What's wrong, Melide?
You seem to be losing focus,
is something bothering you?

name: Melide
text:
Yes...
I'm just worried about whether
Akashi-oniichan and the others are safe...

name: Exio
text:
They should be fine.
There should be plenty of heroes
and operators gathered over there.

name: Exio
text:
...They should be heading
this way by now.

Nodding at his words,
Melide, who had been gazing at the "Pillar of Light,"
focused on the battle again.

name: Huckle
text:
-Ryekie, everyone.
The barrier in this area has been deactivated.

At Huckle's words,
Akashi and the others stood up vigorously.

name: Akashi
text:
Then, we can get out of the observation seats, right?
Let's go quickly!
We need to meet up with [Player] and the others!

name: Huckle
text:
Ah, [Player]-kun and the others are
heading towards the "Pillar of Light."
We should head there immediately too.

name: Ryekie
text:
Ah, the preparations are complete!
Everyone, a monster infestation has occurred!!
Let's be on our guards!!!

name: Sui
text:
Yeah, Exio-san and the others also started their own battle stream.
It seems like monsters have appeared over there too.

name: Mokdai
text:
Crowne-san, are there still problems
with the warp system?

name: Mokdai
text:
Is it better to assume that we can't
use warp to return, like when we came?

name: Crowne
text:
Ah, that's right.
Despite it being an emergency,
but we'll probably have to run there...

Just then, the doors to the
observation area flung open.

name: Shaft
text:
-Everyone, we've come to pick you up!
The space taxis are ready!

name: Digram
text:
Everyone, thank you for waiting.
These are for rescue purposes,
so boarding tickets are not required.

name: Digram
text:
This vehicle will guide you.
Please proceed in order.

name: Mokdai
text:
Shaft-san, Digram-san!
The members of the Global Drivers Union
have gathered!

name: Crowne
text:
As expected of an agency with headquarters on the moon,
with this, we don't have to worry about transportation.

From behind the cheering group,
two people let out sighs of relief.

name: Andrew
text:
-That's good, My Lady.
We made it in time.

name: Flamier
text:
Yes, thank you, Andrew.
Thank you for having coordinated
with everyone in the agency.

name: Sui
text:
Oh, right, Andrew-san, you were also
a member of the Global Drivers Union.

name: Ryekie
text:
Ah, thank you!
With this, we can quickly rush
to help those who need it!

At Ryekie's words, Andrew and
Flamier bowed in thanks.

name: Flamier
text:
Yes, it's an emergency,
so let us cooperate,
transcending our own agencies' boundaries.

name: Huckle
text:
That's right, let's have our company's
members head to the site
immediately as well.

At Huckle's gaze,
the heroes nodded in response.

name: Akashi
text:
Right, Flamier-san!
You were looking for someone named Orbiter, right?

name: Akashi
text:
I only saw it momentarily,
so it might have been a mistake,
but perhaps-

name: Akashi
text:
Right now, he might be
with [Player] and the others.

At Akashi's words,
Flamier and Andrew's eyes widened.

name: Andrew
text:
I-Is that true!?
Do you know where
he is now!?

name: Crowne
text:
Ah, I'm receiving [Player]'s terminal operation logs.
The coordinates should be paired with them too.

name: Flamier
text:
...Parallel Flight Inc. members,
Andrew and I will also head to the "Pillar of Light"
in our private aircraft.

name: Flamier
text:
If you don't mind,
would you care to join us?

name: Flamier
text:
-I will also explain
the current situation to everyone.

-Meanwhile, [Player] and the others
had traversed the barrier and arrived
at the entrance of the "Pillar of Light."

This place, which had been bustling with people moments before,
was now deserted, with everyone having evacuated beforehand.

name: Orbiter
text:
We finally made it-!
Now [Player] won't warp anymore,
so we're safe!

options.text: It was all thanks to everyone.

name: Yotaro
text:
Truthfully, I thought climbing all that height
would be incredibly difficult, but-

name: Yotaro
text:
I hardly got tired.
I didn't fall either,
so it was just "needless worries".

name: Denebola
text:
Ah, my body felt light.
Unlike usual, it felt strange,
but it wasn't unpleasant.

name: Pubraseer
text:
This time, our burden was lightened,
thanks to Orbiter and you, [Player].

name: Pubraseer
text:
It was certainly a long period of
Parallel Weapon usage and observation,
so are either of you tired?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Pubraseer
dialogue_after_selection.text:
How reassuring, [Player].
Thank you, I will continue to rely on your strength.

options.text: I'm a little tired, but I'm fine.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Pubraseer
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I see, it's okay to rest a little.
If you feel tired, I'll lend you my shoulder.
...Please don't overdo it.

options.text: I've been through a lot, so I'm toughened up...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Pubraseer
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...[Player].
This might not be appropriate in this emergency, but-

dialogue_after_selection.name: Pubraseer
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Please don't overdo it.
When I think about the difficulties you've encountered so far, I'm worried for you.

text:
At Pubraseer's words, [Player] nodded,
and released their transformations to conserve stamina.

name: Orbiter
text:
Alright, let's go inside quickly!
There might be people in trouble inside, right?

name: Orbiter
text:
...Oh, wait a minute!
That- that's a part of my spaceship!

Having found a part fallen near the entrance,
Orbiter rushed over, with his spacesuit clanking.

name: Denebola
text:
It fell all the way here, huh.
Good thing it was found, Orbiter.

name: Orbiter
text:
Yeah-!
There are still many parts missing,
but with this, I might be able to repair it a little!

Orbiter happily started
combining the two parts.

name: Gaisei
text:
...By the way, "Observer".
This gate won't open,
so is it alright for me to break it?

Ignoring their exchange,
Gaisei, who had been absent-minded,
pointed to the entrance gate in his line of sight.

The gate, with a reinforced glass-like texture,
had a very sturdy construction.

name: Yotaro
text:
-No.
Let me repeat myself.
No, Gaisei-kun.

name: Yotaro
text:
It looks like a really high-end gate,
so it probably has a special unlocking method.
If you break it, I don't know how much that will cost us.

name: Yotaro
text:
Just the other day, the store's sales
were almost zero due to the repair costs
of things you broke, Gaisei-kun.

name: Gaisei
text:
...This unworthy one did not intend for such things to happen.
Besides, I am the one who procures the store's goods.

name: Yotaro
text:
Are you sure, Gaisei-kun?
If you break this thing,
you can say goodbye to another ingredient in the miso soup.

name: Denebola
text:
...Hey, [Player].
You were in this venue, right?
Do you know how to open it?

options.text: Oh, right, you all don't know.
You went directly to the exam area, after all.

text:
[Player] placed their hand over
the biometric authentication system
installed next to the gate.

Then, the lamp above the gate
turned from red to green,
changing to an enter-able state.

options.text: You hold your terminal over it for it to scan.
It will open once you register your biometric information.
Apparently, this is a security measure.

name: Pubraseer
text:
I see, the purpose must be to monitor entrants,
to know who entered and when.
Well, it doesn't seem to be a problem.

Following [Player]'s example,
Pubraseer passed through the gate.
Once one person passed, the lamp returned to red.

name: Yotaro
text:
I just checked, and
that does seem to be the case...
But, it's very much incompatible with us.

name: Yotaro
text:
...Yeah, it seems it won't open unless you can show
the individual's information from their personal terminal,
or for inorganic lifeforms, their individual information.

name: Denebola
text:
So I just have to hold up my terminal, huh.
...Hey, Orbiter.
What are you doing, let's get going?

Orbiter, called over
by Denebola, trembled.

name: Orbiter
text:
...Ah, um, m-me?
P-please wait a minute...!

Orbiter, who had been cheerfully trying to repair
the spaceship parts, suddenly stopped his hands.

His face display showed a panicked expression,
and he remained motionless.

name: Pubraseer
text:
...Hm?
What's wrong, Orbiter?
Are you feeling unwell?

name: Orbiter
text:
Eh, no, I'm not...
My body is, f-fine!
The doctor said there's nothing wrong even after examination-

name: Orbiter
text:
So, could you please go ahead?
I'll catch up right away!

name: Pubraseer
text:
Orbiter, I cannot leave you alone here.
Monsters have also appeared here, so it's very dangerous.

name: Denebola
text:
...Hey, Orbiter.
You know you need to hurry too, right?

name: Denebola
text: If you're not feeling well,Come on, get over here.

name: Orbiter
text:
U-Uhm, I...
U-Ugh...

Orbiter fell silent.
Clutching his spaceship parts,
his head remained bowed down, speechless.

Seeing his state,
Denebola searched for words to talk,
while organizing his thoughts.

name: Denebola
text:
...I would like to apologize if I was wrong, but...
Orbiter, there's something I want to ask you...

name: Denebola
text:
...You.
Could it be,
that inside that spacesuit-

name: Denebola
text: ...there's nobody inside?

With a clatter, making an unpleasant sound,
the spaceship parts scattered at Orbiter's feet.

name: Orbiter
text:
W-What are you talking about, Denebola?
There's no way-

name: Denebola
text:
When you fell from above,
you did hit me in a bad spot,
and so I lost consciousness, but...

name: Denebola
text:
Thinking about it again,
I thought it was too light for there
to be a human inside the spacesuit.

name: Denebola
text:
If it were the weight of a whole person falling on top of me,
I wouldn't have gotten away unharmed either.

name: Denebola
text:
...Orbiter, I don't know
what you're worried about, but-

name: Denebola
text:
I'm not good with lies or deception.
...I won't force you, but if possible,
could you tell me the truth?

Orbiter managed to squeeze out some words,
but then lowered his head again.

Denebola's words were by no means harsh,
but Orbiter still expressed strong agitation to them.

name: Pubraseer
text:
...[Player].
Let's return to them.

Pubraseer quietly spoke.
His words contained various emotions,
directed at Orbiter.

However, Pubraseer simply, quietly,
gazed at Orbiter with a serious expression.

name: Pubraseer
text:
...Orbiter must be experiencing an internal conflict
that he cannot express right now.

name: Pubraseer
text:
I don't know what he's hiding...
But-

Pubraseer gripped the crystal
at his chest with his hand.

name: Pubraseer
text:
The feeling of worrying whether to trust everyone,
even though you understand it intellectually,
your heart still feels anxious-

name: Pubraseer
text:
I felt the same way when I was appointed as the Captain.
I can understand his feelings.

name: Pubraseer
text:
And what he needs now is to be shown
that he has companions on his side.
...Just as my friends did for me.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Ah, his dream of becoming an astronaut,
which he talked about so cheerfully,
...I really don't want to cloud it.

name: Pubraseer
text:
I want to give Orbiter a push.
-I want to be his strength.

At Pubraseer's words,
[Player]'s terminal showed a strong reaction.

Responding to Pubraseer's will,
dazzling light overflowed.

The terminal displayed a message
different from usual.

options.text: As expected, it's a new path!

name: Mobile Terminal
text:
New path detected.
Target: Pubraseer
Strength: Very strong

At [Player]'s words,
Pubraseer nodded back strongly.

name: Mobile Terminal
text:
-Connect to the path?
If you wish to begin operation,
please tap "OK."

Upon [Player]'s approval,
particles of light overflowed into the surroundings.

Then, when Pubraseer,
enveloped in that light,
reappeared-

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text: -Th-This form is...!!

Pubraseer stood there, clad in a new suit,
and carrying a saber-shaped Parallel Weapon
at his waist.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Thank you, [Player].
This attire makes me stand tall.
I'm glad if it makes you happy.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
...Ah, how nostalgic.
[Player], you managed to observe this for me...!?

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
I used to find it stiff,
...but now I feel invigorated.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
Ah, now... no,
now "I" am at my best!
...It feels like I've returned to that time.

Pubraseer drew his saber
and held it forward.

Its handguard was inlaid with
five gems, radiating a gentle glow.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
...My friends.
You're giving me another chance, aren't you?
...Leave it to me, I will surely accomplish it.

Pubraseer turned his gaze to [Player].
Nodding in response, the two rushed over to Orbiter.

name: Denebola
text:
...Hm?
Pubraseer, did your hero suit just change?

name: Gaisei
text:
...Oh, Pubraseer-dono's hero suit...!
Well, well, this adds to the enjoyment.

name: Yotaro
text:
...I see. This is the power of [Player],
which I heard rumors about,
to transform others into another form, isn't it?

Three different reactions were shown to
Pubraseer's new hero suit.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
Ah, [Player] observed it for me.
My dream, now...

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
...Orbiter.
Would you like to talk with me for a bit?
There's something I want to tell you.

name: Orbiter
text:
...C-Captain.
I-I...

Pubraseer gently called out to Orbiter,
and then took Orbiter's hand.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
...It's okay, Orbiter.
You don't have to force yourself,
just let go and calm down.

name: Orbiter
text:
............
Yeah, thank you, Captain...
...U-Uhm, about the talk-

Just then, the familiar unpleasant sensation
ran down [Player]'s spine.

options.text: It seems like we have some company.

name: Yotaro
text:
...This presence, it's the monsters again.
They really like the kind
who would never read the room.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
-Kuh, monsters won't choose
their time or place...!

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
Orbiter, I'm sorry.
We have to defeat the monsters first...!

name: Orbiter
text:
U-Uhm...!
I-I'll fight too!
It's an emergency... right!

name: Denebola
text:
Ah, [Player], please transform me.
Just like before, leave the perimeter watch to me.

[Player] nodded, and along with Yotaro,
transformed the group.

name: Gaisei
text:
...Oh.
Their numbers have increased since earlier.
It seems it will be enough to pass the time.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
Orbiter, can you really fight...?
Don't push yourself.

name: Orbiter
text:
U-Uhm...!
I'm fine.
I'll do my best with you!

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
...I'm sorry, thank you.
After this battle ends,
there's something I want to tell you.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
First, let's fight together!
...It's alright, for we're never by ourselves.

Pubraseer touched his saber.
The gems pulsed, glowing brighter.

Then, he took the brim of his hat
and pulled it down deeply, glaring sharply
at the opposing monsters.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
...This new Parallel Weapon
is the memory of my time with my friends.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
A dream no one can defile-
I shall not let mere monsters interfere with it!!
Battle Start
